description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Those pesky balls have escaped! Ohh no! What could we do? all you have are an unlimited supply of walls. Hmmm, Maybe you could trap the balls with the walls? Includes 2 distinct game modes, HighScores, and Unlimited content through procedural level generation in both game modes.
description.short: Those pesky balls have escaped! Ohh no! What could we do? all you have are an unlimited supply of walls. Hmmm, Maybe you could trap the balls with the walls? Includes 2 distinct game modes, HighScores, and Unlimited content through procedural level generation in both game modes.
